channel.title: Posts on Oddly Specific
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Oddly Specific

item.title: When 0.1 + 0.2 Does Not Equal 0.3
item.description: I explain the dangers of using == and R’s %in% operator with decimal values and how dplyr::near can be used instead of ==. I also show how to overload the %in% operator to perform safe approximate matching of numeric vectors.

item.title: Everything You Know about the P-Value is Wrong
item.description: If you want to read my version of the p-value sermon, check out this post I wrote for the tl;dr pharmacy blog.
